trans-unit.source: This section will help you install and configure <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

seg-source.mrk: This section will help you install and configure <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

target.mrk: This section will help you install and configure <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

trans-unit.source: Access the <xref href="cgstutorialintro.dita#cgstutorialintro">Self-study tutorial</xref> to get up and running with Derby. This tutorial demonstrates how to use <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in the embedded and client/server configurations.

seg-source.mrk: Access the <xref href="cgstutorialintro.dita#cgstutorialintro">Self-study tutorial</xref> to get up and running with Derby.
This tutorial demonstrates how to use <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in the embedded and client/server configurations.

target.mrk: Access the <xref href="cgstutorialintro.dita#cgstutorialintro">Self-study tutorial</xref> to get up and running with Derby.
This tutorial demonstrates how to use <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> in the embedded and client/server configurations.

trans-unit.source: If you are an experienced JDBC programmer, you should also see the <xref href="cgsquck19524.dita#cgsquck19524"></xref>.
